languages.text: {n}Кунрад серьезно кивает.{/n} "Я в курсе, {name} — было бы совершенно недопустимо пропустить подобный факт при составлении профиля. Вас постиг рок обладать ведьмовскими силами... и употреблять их на благо {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}. Воистину, вам выпал непростой жребий".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кунрад серьезно кивает.{/n} "Я в курсе, {name} — было бы совершенно недопустимо пропустить подобный факт при составлении профиля. Вас постиг рок обладать ведьмовскими силами... и употреблять их на благо Империума. Воистину, вам выпал непростой жребий".

languages.text: {n}Voigtvir nods gravely.{/n} "I am aware of that fact, {name} — it would have been unacceptable negligence to have overlooked such a detail when compiling your profile. Fate bestowed upon you powers of witchcraft... and a duty to use them for the good of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Yours is truly an unenviable lot."
languages.original_text: {n}Кунрад серьезно кивает.{/n} "Я в курсе, {name} — было бы совершенно недопустимо пропустить подобный факт при составлении профиля. Вас постиг рок обладать ведьмовскими силами... и употреблять их на благо {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}. Воистину, вам выпал непростой жребий".

Fate bestowed upon you powers of witchcraft... and a duty to use them for the good of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Yours is truly an unenviable lot."

{n}Voigtvir nods gravely.{/n} "I am aware of that fact, {name} — it would have been unacceptable negligence to have overlooked such a detail when compiling your profile. Fate bestowed upon you powers of witchcraft... and a duty to use them for the good of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Yours is truly an unenviable lot."

languages.text: {n}维特威尔严肃地点了点头。{/n}“我很清楚这个事实，{name}。如果有人在编纂您的资料时，忽略了这样的细节，那恐怕是不可原谅的疏漏。命运赐予了您巫术的力量……也赋予了您责任，让您为{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}造福。这样的命运确实充满了责任。”
languages.original_text: {n}Voigtvir nods gravely.{/n} "I am aware of that fact, {name} — it would have been unacceptable negligence to have overlooked such a detail when compiling your profile. Fate bestowed upon you powers of witchcraft... and a duty to use them for the good of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Yours is truly an unenviable lot."

traits.locale_text: {n}维特威尔严肃地点了点头。{/n}“我很清楚这个事实，{name}。如果有人在编纂您的资料时，忽略了这样的细节，那恐怕是不可原谅的疏漏。命运赐予了您巫术的力量……也赋予了您责任，让您为{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}造福。这样的命运确实充满了责任。”

languages.text: {n}Voigtvir asiente con solemnidad.{/n} «Soy consciente de ello, {name}; habría sido una negligencia intolerable ignorar ese detalle al preparar su perfil. El destino le ha otorgado los poderes de la brujería... y el deber de usarlos para el bien del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. No muchos envidiarían su carga».
languages.original_text: {n}Voigtvir nods gravely.{/n} "I am aware of that fact, {name} — it would have been unacceptable negligence to have overlooked such a detail when compiling your profile. Fate bestowed upon you powers of witchcraft... and a duty to use them for the good of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Yours is truly an unenviable lot."

traits.locale_text: {n}Voigtvir asiente con solemnidad.{/n} «Soy consciente de ello, {name}; habría sido una negligencia intolerable ignorar ese detalle al preparar su perfil. El destino le ha otorgado los poderes de la brujería... y el deber de usarlos para el bien del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. No muchos envidiarían su carga».

languages.text: {n}ボイトヴィルは重々しくうなずいた。{/n}「その事実は承知しております、{name}さん。あなたのプロフィールを作成する際にそのような重要な点を見逃していたら、許されない過失だったでしょう。運命はあなたに魔法の力を…そして、それを{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の正義のために使用するという義務も与えました。まったくもって、羨ましくない運命です」
languages.original_text: {n}Voigtvir nods gravely.{/n} "I am aware of that fact, {name} — it would have been unacceptable negligence to have overlooked such a detail when compiling your profile. Fate bestowed upon you powers of witchcraft... and a duty to use them for the good of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Yours is truly an unenviable lot."

traits.locale_text: {n}ボイドヴィルは重々しくうなずいた。{/n}「その事実は承知しております。{name}あなたのプロフィールを作成する際にそのような詳細を見落としたのは、容認できない過失でした。運命はあなたに魔法の力を与えました…そして、それを{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の正義のために使用するという義務も。本当にどれほどうらやんでもに足りないほどです」
{n}ボイトヴィルは重々しくうなずいた。{/n}「その事実は承知しております、{name}さん。あなたのプロフィールを作成する際にそのような重要な点を見逃していたら、許されない過失だったでしょう。運命はあなたに魔法の力を…そして、それを{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の正義のために使用するという義務も与えました。まったくもって、羨ましくない運命です」

languages.original_text: {n}Voigtvir nods gravely.{/n} "I am aware of that fact,  — it would have been unacceptable negligence to have overlooked such a detail when compiling your profile. Fate bestowed upon you powers of witchcraft... and a duty to use them for the good of the Imperium. Yours is truly an unenviable lot."

languages.text: {n}Voigtvir hoche la tête d'un air grave.{/n} « J'en suis parfaitement conscient, {name}. Négliger un tel détail vous concernant aurait été faire preuve d'une négligence inacceptable. Le destin vous a conféré des pouvoirs de sorcellerie... et le devoir de les utiliser pour le bien de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Un sort peu enviable, s'il en est. »
languages.original_text: {n}Voigtvir nods gravely.{/n} "I am aware of that fact, {name} — it would have been unacceptable negligence to have overlooked such a detail when compiling your profile. Fate bestowed upon you powers of witchcraft... and a duty to use them for the good of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Yours is truly an unenviable lot."

traits.locale_text: {n}Voigtvir hoche la tête d'un air grave.{/n} « J'en suis parfaitement conscient, {name}. Négliger un tel détail vous concernant aurait été faire preuve d'une négligence inacceptable. Le destin vous a conféré des pouvoirs de sorcellerie... et le devoir de les utiliser pour le bien de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Un sort peu enviable, s'il en est. »

languages.text: {n}Voigtvir nickt todernst.{/n} "Ich bin mir dessen bewusst, {name} – es wäre eine unverzeihliche Nachlässigkeit meinerseits gewesen, hätte ich dieses Detail beim Erstellen Eures Profils übersehen. Das Schicksal hat Euch Kräfte der Hexerei gewährt ... zusammen mit der Pflicht, sie zum Wohle des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} einzusetzen. Ihr seid um Euer Los wahrlich nicht zu beneiden."
languages.original_text: {n}Voigtvir nods gravely.{/n} "I am aware of that fact, {name} — it would have been unacceptable negligence to have overlooked such a detail when compiling your profile. Fate bestowed upon you powers of witchcraft... and a duty to use them for the good of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Yours is truly an unenviable lot."

traits.locale_text: {n}Voigtvir nickt todernst.{/n} "Ich bin mir dessen bewusst, {name} – es wäre eine unverzeihliche Nachlässigkeit meinerseits gewesen, hätte ich dieses Detail beim Erstellen Eures Profils übersehen. Das Schicksal hat Euch Kräfte der Hexerei gewährt ... zusammen mit der Pflicht, sie zum Wohle des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} einzusetzen. Ihr seid um Euer Los wahrlich nicht zu beneiden."

languages.text: {n}Voigtvir, ölçülü bir tavırla başını eğiyor.{/n} "Bu hakikatin farkındayım sayın {name}. Profilinizi derlerken böyle bir ayrıntıyı göz ardı etmek kabul edilemez bir ihmal olurdu. Kader size cadılık güçleri... Ve onları {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'un{/g} hayrı için kullanma vazifesi bahşetmiş. Pek gıpta edilemeyecek bir talih doğrusu."
languages.original_text: {n}Voigtvir nods gravely.{/n} "I am aware of that fact, {name} — it would have been unacceptable negligence to have overlooked such a detail when compiling your profile. Fate bestowed upon you powers of witchcraft... and a duty to use them for the good of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Yours is truly an unenviable lot."

traits.locale_text: {n}Voigtvir, ölçülü bir tavırla başını eğiyor.{/n} "Bu hakikatin farkındayım sayın {name}. Profilinizi derlerken böyle bir ayrıntıyı göz ardı etmek kabul edilemez bir ihmal olurdu. Kader size cadılık güçleri... Ve onları {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'un hayrı için kullanma vazifesi bahşetmiş. Pek gıpta edilemeyecek bir talih doğrusu."
